Introducing, Savlon Surface Disinfectant Spray which will help keep you and your loved ones safe by killing a wide range of germs like bacteria, fungi and moulds. Do not use on copper, brass, painted/shellacked/lacquered/ varnished surfaces (including treated/polished wood) or acrylic plastics. Savlon Surface Disinfectant Spray protects your family by providing an effective germ-kill Kills a wide range of germs, bacteria, moulds & fungiIncredibly versatile with a fresh & pleasant smell. Owing to the recent health-related scenario in India as well as across the globe we are taking utmost preventive measures at our home and sanitizing everything possible to keep ourselves germ-free. While we are taking measures at home, it’s equally important to stay germ-free when we go out. To consume germ-free fruits & vegetables at home, we have Veggie Clean to our rescue but what about eating fruits outside? How do we clean our fruits when we are travelling or eating in the office or during picnics? Just washing them with water is simply not an option as it won’t get rid of all germs, pesticides & waxes. Introducing Veggie Clean Food Safe Wipes that remove germs, pesticides & waxes from fruits safely. Veggie Clean wipes are made of 100% Food Grade Cleansers and hence are 100% safe to use. Not just this, Veggie Clean Wipes have multiple uses. These wipes can be used for all food-related products such as grocery packs, milk packs etc. both at home as well as out of home consumption. They can also be used to clean crockeries at restaurants when we eat out as there is no other way to clean them, obviously, sanitizers aren’t safe to use on crockeries since it has alcohol and hence not fit for food products. Veggie Clean wipes can also be used to clean your kids’ toys. Kids’ toys tend to accumulate germs & dust due to lying on the floors or kids throwing them in multiple places. So, when kids take these toys in their mouth, it can lead to several diseases. Don’t worry, Veggie clean Food Safe wipes are made of 100% food-grade cleansers and hence are completely safe to clean your kids’ toys as well. Veggie Clean wipes are free of all harmful additives like preservatives & soap and have no added chlorine or alcohol. Usage - Remove a wipe. Clean the entire surface for 50-60 secs. Wipe thoroughly. Close the pack after use to avoid drying. Discard the wipe in a closed waste bin. Always wipe before you bite. Start a healthy habit of clean eating today!

1. Prevents Colour Run Accidents Colours that run in the water during the wash might bleed into your laundry. Thanks to its patented technology the sheet acts like a magnet and traps loose dye from the water - assuring maximum protection against discolouration and colour runs. The proof is on the sheet!
2. Allows Mixed Washes As the sheet protects against colour transfer it allows you to wash all colours together, even with whites. Colour Catcher protects your laundry and saves your time and money by allowing mixed washes.
3. Protects Colour Brightness Even if not seen by the eye, traces of dye might deposit every wash and build up a layer of mixed colours on the garment over time - making your coloured garments dull. The sheets trap dyes from the water before they deposit on the garments. It helps to keep your colours brighter for longer!
4. Prevents Greying Greying is an accumulation process. Grime and dirt are traces which redeposit on the fabric during several washes and their build-up becomes visible over time. By removing loose dirt particles from the wash the sheet protects the fabric from greying.
5. Effective at All Temperatures Extra absorbent fibres of the sheet provides maximum protection at all temperatures. For best results use Colour Catcher in every wash.
6. Prevents Residual Dirt Redepositing Dirt particles may also float in the wash water. With its unique feature, the sheet catches released dirt particles from the wash water for better cleanliness of your fabrics.

description:
Harpic Germ and Stain Blaster is a powerful toilet cleaner, the strongest of the Harpic lot that gives you unbeatable cleaning both above and below the waterline and citrus freshness for the toilet. Its thick liquid formula with powerful cleaning agents clings to the toilet surface and removes the toughest stains and kills the sturdiest germs, providing your toilet 100 % more stain-removal and 100 % better germ protection. It gives unbeatable cleaning by removing the toughest spots and stains on the toilet bowl. It also gives your toilet a pleasant fresh fragrance that is available in two variants - Citrus and Floral. While Harpic blasts away germs and bacterias from even the hardest reaching areas of your toilet, here are a few bonus tips that can help you keep safe and your toilet clean every time.
Germs can linger in your toilet even after flushing on regular days, therefore make sure, even if your toilet looks clean, you must use a disinfectant toilet cleaner after regular intervals of a few days. Also clean the bathroom surfaces, including the walls at regular intervals. Always close the lid of the toilet before you flush as there are chances that bacteria such as E. coli and salmonella may fly into the air and land on the seat and other surfaces. For the same reason above, try and store your toothbrushes, contact lenses, etc. away from the toilet or in a closed cabinet. New Harpic Germ & Stain Blaster is the Most Powerful Toilet Cleaner from Harpic which spreads on the toilet bowl easily and through its special formulation gives your 100% More Germ Kill and 100% More Stain Removal. The genesis of the rechargeable battery: The original rechargeable batteries were manufactured with Nickel-cadmium (Ni-Cd), but the technology soon switched over to use Nickel-metal hydride (Ni-MH) because cadmium is harmful to the environment. Eveready strongly believes in protecting the environment and manufactures an environmentally-friendly Ni-MH range of rechargeable batteries.
Eveready Advantage: Cost-Effective A one-time buy, rechargeable batteries can be reused hundreds of times. Eveready Rechargeable batteries can last for very long if used properly. Environment-friendly While many batteries can contain corrosive materials that have an adverse effect on health and the environment, Eveready batteries are manufactured following strict processes and guidelines and are environment-friendly.
Excellent Capacity We use Ni-MH batteries which have a 30-40% higher amount of energy stored than a standard nickel-cadmium battery. Chargers Our chargers also come with intelligent charging, overcharge and deep discharge protection and are ideal to use with Eveready Ultima rechargeable batteries. Conserving Energy Rechargeable batteries can be used repeatedly, which means that, fewer of these need to be manufactured and thereby the operational footprint is considerably less.
Eveready, India's leading battery company was amongst the foremost players to make a foray into the 'Rechargeable Batteries' segment with its 'Eveready Ultima' brand of batteries and chargers. 'Eveready Ultima' took the rechargeable battery market in India by storm, with its world-class, value-for-money product range. The range comprises the best rechargeable batteries and chargers for digital cameras, toys, wireless mouse and MP3 players, etc. The 2700 series is ideal for use in equipment that requires high-power. For instance, today's digital cameras are extremely high-drain devices. The batteries must power a colour LCD, a flash, a motorised zoom lens, an autofocus system, the multi-megapixel imager and the associated processing hardware. Hence, a powerful rechargeable battery is often a better option.
